name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Boston.com]
description: Hides the Boston.com header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info:
The red and blue vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar. Mouse over them to restore the element.
  1. Reduce the headline size to twice the size of the article
  2. On zoom (ctrl+plus) let the article become wider, but no wider than the screen
